text: 5/1/2012 MVS-8000X Series 1 MVS-8000Ｘ Series CNI-37/A, CNO-38/A/B Service Training Document MVS-8000X Series 2 5/1/2012 CNI-37/A  20 Input Connector Board  3Gbps I/F equalizer and reclocker The difference of CNI-37 and CNI-37A is only the CN panel.  CNI-37 :  MVS-8000X (Primary Input 1 – 20)  MKS-8110X (Primary Input 21 – 40, 41 – 60, 61 – 80, 81 – 100, 101 – 120, 121 – 140)  MKS-8170X (Premium Input 1 – 20)  MKS-8180X (DME Input 1 – 20)  CNI-37A  MVS-8000X (FC Input 1 – 16, Primary Input 141 – 144) MVS-8000X Series 3 5/1/2012 CNO-37, CNO-38/A/B  20 Output Connector Board  3Gbps I/F cable driver The difference of CNO-37 and CNO-38 is with or without reclocker. CNO-37 has, and CNO-38 doesn’t have. The difference of CNO-38, CNO-38A and CNO-38B is only the CN panel.  CNO-37  MKS-8170X (DME Output 1 – 20)  CNO-38 :  MVS-8000X (Output 1 – 20)  MKS-8160X (Output25 – 40)  CNO-38A  MVS-8000X (M/E1 - 4 Ouptut1 – 4, P/P Output1 - 4)  CNO-38B  MVS-8000X (FC OUT1 – 4, MSD OUT 1, 2, Output 21 – 24, 45 – 48) MVS-8000X Series 4 5/1/2012 Questions?
